conversations.content: What's a good summary of my 100 most recent transactions this year in terms of categories and amounts?

(function_thought) 
To create a summary of the 100 most recent transactions in terms of categories and amounts, I will first retrieve the most recent transactions to understand their details. I will use the `get_most_recent_transactions` function to obtain this information. This initial step is crucial to analyze the transactions for categorization and amount summarization. 
</function_thought>

(function_call)
[get_most_recent_transactions(parameters={"n": 100})]
</function_call>
